titleStmt.title: The case of the marriners which served the East-India Comapny in their wars in the East-Indies. And of the widows and orphans of those that perished in the said wars, to the number of five hundred, and as many widows. : Humbly presented to the honourable House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
